ftoc:analyze: Run FTOC analysis on feature files in the specified directory
ftoc:report: Generate a specific report type (concordance, tags, anti-patterns)
ftoc:build: Build the FTOC project from source
ftoc:test: Run tests for the FTOC project
ftoc:setup: Set up FTOC environment and dependencies
ftoc:help: Show help for FTOC commands and options
ftoc:generate: Generate sample feature file with best practices
ftoc:validate: Validate feature files against best practices
